title: How We Got Here #8: Underground In The 1980's (Hardcore, Goth, Metal, Garage Rock, Comics, Horror)
description:
And now we dive below the shiny façade of the 1980s. In this episode of How We Got Here we go Underground to the scenes that did not grab the official attention yet would shape the world we live in today. Hardcore Punk, Speed Metal, Thrash Metal, Death Metal, Black Metal, Ska, Industrial, Goth, Garage Rock, Skaters, comic books, graphic novels, anime, exploitation films, horror, folk punk, American Gothic, noise, and more. Come with me as we confront one of the strangest moments in American history from the underside.

Since this is another long chapter in our historical saga here are some timestamps for the different sections. You can bite off as much or little as you want. 

02:50 Introduction to the 1980's Underground
07:00 Hardcore
24:55 Goth and Industrial
48:30 Heavy Metal
58:30 Tribes
01:24:00 Alternative Noise
01:47:30 Folk Punk and American Gothic
01:59:20 Comics
02:07:15 Film and Anime
02:26:15 Puppet Films
02:33:15 Conclusions
''''''''

Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 

Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past.
